one_reviews_text: Seems like a series of cheap cell phone vr scares, but they are all well choreopgrahed and varied. Good job.

So if you're having trouble sleeping, then I strongly recommend this app.  There are four experiences and amazingly, they are all pretty dull.  The haunted house is average, could have been much better if they didn't have you going around in circles for no reason.  It's hard to be immersed when you can't figure out why you're floating in circles.  The ocean experience?  Yikes, the graphics are so horrible it's almost laughable.  Well, the drill scene then?  Nah, going to the dentist is scarier.  Surely the spider scene must be scary?  It is the best experience in my opinion.  But it crashed on me and made my Rift go black and it took me a while to figure out that this was not the intended experience since I could still hear the spiders.  That was the biggest scare of all.  When I rebooted the app and tried it again, it was disappointing in comparison to the crash.  At least I only wasted .99 cents and that's why I give it 2 stars instead of 1.
The haunted house is pretty cool.
Graphics aren't nearly up to the level of Face Your Fears or The Forgotten Chamber (which got a lower rating?), but it's worth spending a few minutes with if you can get it on sale.
boring , it causes nauseas and it is not scary. Please give my $ 99 back
review_feedback: Fear is subjective I understand. What caused your nausia? Also I think Oculus allows a refund of my experience. You have to go through them.

one_reviews_text: Crashed on Haunted House, game is terrible . Would have felt better giving my money to a street hobo.
Creepy, and interesting. I enjoyed all the levels, besides the shipwreck as it seemed a bit lacking but over all great job!
I went in thinking "man this isnt gonna scare me" boy was I wrong. Definitely worth the $2.99, and I recommend it to anyone who likes a good jumpscare!

review_title: Sorry, I dont get it! Its boring!
one_reviews_text:
I am in the water and see dead people and a ship. Then a "monster fish" that apperats more funny comes and eats me. It looks all very bad and boring to me. :-(
Then I am in a chair and a big drill comes in front of my face but the situation is not scary at all. Then I walk around in a big house. Thats in fact the only good part in this "demo". Also not really scary but at least not so boring as the other rooms. Maybe in the future there comes more like that then i would give more stars but like that its really not good at all... :-(

OK, what would be really scary in VR to me? I would like a situation where i am a fly and i hang in a spider web. Then the spider comes out of the nest and crawls into my direction. THIS would be scary to me! ;-)

This could become a very interesting pschycological experience for people, if done right. Right now it shows that it's on early access stage, and thats fine, as long as this evolves to the gem it can be.
review_feedback: Thank you yes its early access, but is clasiffied as a gallery app due to me being a single developer.
Hi Tideli, does the game work for you now or is it still causing a problem? Please email me if the problem persist. My email is on the Terror Dimension website.

one_reviews_text:
This is a great experience for first time or experienced VR users. 

It's simple controls and intuitive game play makes it very easy to jump in and enjoy.
